article.title: LCE Receives NSWCCD Contract for Surface Ship Acquisition
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Naval Surface Warfare Center Carderock Division

article.text: The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Carderock Division, Philadelphia, has awarded a $17.3 million contract to Life Cycle Engineering (LCE), Charleston, South Carolina. Under the terms of the contract, LCE will continue to provide the U.S. Navy with engineering and program management support for surface ship acquisition programs.
